text.section: A suspension under subsection (1) of this section is effective for thirty (30) days unless the board of directors calls and gives notice of a special meeting of members for removal of the director before the end of the thirty (30) day period, in which case the suspension is effective until adjournment of the meeting or the director is removed.

law.history: Created 2012 Ky. Acts ch. 160, sec. 61, effective July 12, 2012.
